array.string: /usr/bin/profiles -L -U physreg | grep de.uni-stuttgart.physcip.physreg.appwhitelist || ( test "$USER" = "physreg" && /usr/bin/profiles -U physreg -IvF /usr/local/share/physreg_profiles/physreg.appwhitelist.mobileconfig && /usr/bin/profiles -U physreg -IvF /usr/local/share/physreg_profiles/physreg.dock.mobileconfig ) test "$USER" = "physreg" && killall Finder && open /Applications/physdash.app
